room_title: Escape room "The Shackle Hall" by The Key Haunted Escape Rooms in Indianapolis
room_description:
This game begins in a somewhat unfortunate position for you and your friends. Shackled by both hands and feet, you must devise your escape.
Note: Be sure to wear something to protect your ankles, as leg irons tend to wear against skin in an unpleasant way. The group must be exactly 6 or 8 players.
